title: Best of the Program | Guests: David Buckner & Carol Roth | 3/17/22
description:
Vivek Ramaswamy, author of “Woke INC.,” joins to give a private CEO’s opinion on ESG scores. David Buckner, adjunct professor at Columbia University, joins to discuss the economy and the Bretton Woods system. Carol Roth, author and former investment banker, joins to discuss how the Federal Reserve raising the reserve rates could cost you.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
